title: War Crimes
description: A girl who despises Veterans Day.A reanimated Civil War solider.A gang of grave robbers.Prepare for war.Seventeen-year-old Vivian Ports has lived in the middle of a small town cemetery her entire life. She’s never been afraid of her home, until the night she witnesses a grave robbery from her back porch. Then Jesse Britten shows up, begging for help. And there’s something off about him. Jesse’s a Union soldier who’s been dead and buried for the past century. As the two work to uncover the mystery behind Jesse’s second chance at life, they learn what it means to grieve for those they’ve lost, and discover that the grave truly has no victory.
author: Talbie Downing
